name: Apple and Brown Sugar Corned Beef
author: tonmeilleurami
summary: I make this every year for my family on St. Patrick's Day. Delicious and filling!
ingredients: 2 (3 pound) corned beef briskets with spice packets
1 head cabbage, cored and cut into large chunks
directions: Pour the apple juice into a large slow cooker, and mix in the brown sugar and mustard, stirring until the brown sugar has dissolved
Mix in the contents of the spice packets, and lay the briskets into the apple juice mixture
Top with red potatoes, carrots, onions, and cabbage chunks
Push all ingredients into the liquid
Cover and cook on High until corned beef is very tender, 4 to 5 hours; or cook on Low for 8 to 10 hours
Slice meat thinly across the grain, and serve with vegetables
